attributes.action: Urge the NHS to re research flat head syndrome and treat it in babies!
attributes.additional_details: I was lucky enough to have my own little boys treatment funded by friend and family on a crowdfunding page. Not everyone is this lucky and all babies deserve the same treatment. Please sign and share! X
attributes.background: urge the NHS to research flat head syndrome in babies and treat it! Currently treatment is only available privately and is very expensive £2025. The NHS current views on flat head syndrome are that is a cosmetic issue!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition asking for the UK Government to require all NHS services in England to fund treatment for flat head syndrome. You could also start a new petition asking for the UK Government to fund further research into flat head syndrome, if that's what you want to happen.
